name: Grinning Marionette
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Bound Servitude
traits.desc: All marionettes serve a Grim Puppeteer. This master can use its action to see through the marionette’s eyes and the marionette can communicate with its master from anywhere. The marionette is forced to execute the orders of its master to the best of its abilities. The marionette becomes a mundane doll if its master is killed.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the marionette remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary doll.

actions.name: Draining Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.
